metadata.title: CVE-2022-28654 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
is_closing_session() allows users to fill up apport.log

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28654` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-gtk - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-kde - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-noui - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-retrace - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
apport-valgrind - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
dh-apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
python3-apport - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
python3-problem-report - 2.21.0-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: apport package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.21.0-0ubuntu1').
